channel.title: CVE Feed for TOBESOFT -- XPLATFORM ActiveX
channel.description: The latest CVEs for TOBESOFT -- XPLATFORM ActiveX

item.title: CVE-2018-5197|2024-08-05T05:26:46.975Z -- tobesoft -- xplatform%20activex
item.description: A vulnerability in the ExtCommon.dll user extension module version 9.2, 9.2.1, 9.2.2 of Xplatform ActiveX could allow attacker to perform a command injection attack. The vulnerability is due to insufficient input validation of command parameters. An crafted malicious parameters could cause arbitrary command to execute.
